UPDATE OM_BUSIORG
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
node_type = #{node_type,jdbcType=varchar},
busiorg_code = #{busiorg_code,jdbcType=varchar},
busi_domain = #{busi_domain,jdbcType=varchar},
busiorg_name = #{busiorg_name,jdbcType=varchar},
busiorg_level = #{busiorg_level,jdbcType=decimal},
guid_org = #{guid_org,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_parents = #{guid_parents,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_position = #{guid_position,jdbcType=varchar},
org_code = #{org_code,jdbcType=varchar},
seqno = #{seqno,jdbcType=varchar},
sortno = #{sortno,jdbcType=decimal},
isleaf = #{isleaf,jdbcType=char},
sub_count = #{sub_count,jdbcType=decimal}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
